page.title: 15ACTIVITIES FOR CHILDREN
page.content: There are a lot of organised clubs in Woodhall Spa for children.Some of them carry on to teenage clubs such as guides.Of course they cost some money but they're great fun. There are other forms of occupations that are not clubs such as paper rounds that you get paid for doing.There is a park in the village with an outdoor swimming pool and a paddling pool for the young children. The park also contains many other interesting things to do including facilities for numerous sports.There are many acres of woodland both in the village and nearby for the children to play in.
